original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: nana bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca nana bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbañca na na bhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammam paṭicca na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve pe avigate pañca
